(This is just great! Sounwave is dead, Cybershark is hostage and 
Battera is some evil freak. There is nothing left of the first 3! I 
knew I shouldn't have started this storyline from the beggining. 
Peace sucks. But I gotta play it out now.)

Trainers

Prebon laughed like a maniac as Striker stumbled to the floor with a 
huge hole in his head. Time to play.

"Excellent! Now I can reprogram Striker to be my warrior without even 
putting a chip on him! Ignatius, get up! Your injury is nothing. We 
will fix it later. Put Spears in a CR Chamber. I'm taking Striker to 
become mine."

Bullet picked up Spears, and Prebon picked up Striker. They headed to 
the bridge.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

"I didn't really know Eagle Eye, but all I knew was he was determined 
for our goal. Lay the body down and I will perform the ceremony."
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq got their chips.

"All right, let's get out friends back!"
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream saw Zardus land. He didn't know who he was fighting, so he 
rean up to him.

"What should I do Lord Zardus?"
